name: SCNPhysicsVehicle
desc: A physics behavior that modifies a physics body to behave like a car, motorcycle, or other wheeled vehicle.

items.name: var chassisBody: SCNPhysicsBody
items.desc: The physics body representing the vehicle’s chassis.

items.name: var wheels: [SCNPhysicsVehicleWheel]
items.desc: An array of SCNPhysicsVehicleWheel objects representing the vehicle’s wheels.

items.name: func applyEngineForce(CGFloat, forWheelAt: Int)
items.desc: Applies a force between the specified wheel and the ground under the vehicle.

items.name: func applyBrakingForce(CGFloat, forWheelAt: Int)
items.desc: Applies a force between the specified wheel and the ground under the vehicle.

items.name: func setSteeringAngle(CGFloat, forWheelAt: Int)
items.desc: Pivots the specified wheel around its steering axis.

items.name: var speedInKilometersPerHour: CGFloat
items.desc: The vehicle’s ground speed, in kilometers per hour.
